title: Drawing, "Botanical Studies of Tree", May–June 1857
markings: Stamps: Verso, bottom: Museum for the Arts of Decoration Cooper Union
inscribed: Recto: Right center, in graphite: Tree fern/ and grasses Verso: upper left, in graphite: 2-leaves at side/ rich green/ in front golden yellow/ inclining to orange/ spangle effect; upper right, in graphite: 2 Rich brown/ stem; right center, in graphite: | Red/ 2-yellow/ 3-green/ petal of lower/ of ---/ Plant

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Botanical Studies of Tree", May–June 1857.
May–June 1857. Graphite
Support: buff paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-834.
